headline: Tracking Dan Loeb's Third Point Portfolio - Q2 2025 Update
summary: Third Point's Q2 2025 13F portfolio rose to $7.62B, with increased concentration in top holdings. Read more about the portfolio here.

headline: StubHub Is Poised for IPO at More Than $9 Billion Valuation
summary: StubHub, the online and mobile ticket reseller that was once owned by  eBay  filed plans to price its initial public offering of more than 34 million shares in a range of $22 to $25 a share.  At the high end of that range, StubHub would be valued at more than $9.3 billion.  StubHub, which eBay acquired in 2007 for $310 million and sold to European ticket reseller Viagogo in 2020 for more than $4 billion, is the latest well-known company to plan to test investors’ appetites for newly issued stocks.

headline: 2 S&P 500 Stocks to Research Further and 1 We Turn Down
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is home to the biggest and most well-known companies in the market, making it a go-to index for investors seeking stability. But not all large-cap stocks are created equal - some are struggling with slowing growth, declining margins, or increased competition.
